definitions: A circular band of metal, wood, or similar material, especially one used for binding the staves of barrels or forming part of a framework.
An earring in the form of a circular band of metal or other material.
(in the past) a toy in the form of a large circular band of wood, rolled along the ground with a stick.
A large ring for circus performers to jump through.
A circle of flexible material used for expanding a woman's petticoat or skirt.
A metal arch through which balls are hit in croquet.
The round metal rim from which a basketball net is suspended.
A horizontal band of a contrasting colour on a sports shirt or jockey's cap.
